identity.name: Clinical Zen
identity.description: A professional, calming, and high-efficiency interface for home health nurses. It balances medical precision with human warmth.

primary.description: Teal 700 - Deep, surgical green for primary actions and branding.

secondary.description: Teal 50 - Very light wash for backgrounds and secondary containers.

accent.description: Rose 500 - For alerts, abnormal vitals, and critical errors.

background.description: Slate 50 - 'Paper White' to reduce eye strain compared to pure white.

surface.description: Pure white for cards and input fields.

dashboard.description: Dense, data-rich layout for patient lists and summaries.

patient_profile.structure: Left sidebar (30%) for Permanent Info, Right content (70%) for Visit History/New Visit.
patient_profile.mobile_behavior: Stack vertically, Permanent Info becomes a collapsible drawer.

assessment_form.structure: Single column, focused sections. Use 'Accordion' or 'Tabs' to manage the long 'Head-to-Toe' assessment list without scrolling fatigue.

login_hero.usage: Split screen login page, right side cover image.

empty_state.usage: Background or illustration for empty lists.

general: Implement the 'Clinical Zen' theme using the specified color palette.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Public Sans' for body text.
Ensure all forms are touch-friendly (min height 44px for inputs).
Use Shadcn components as the base but override styles to match the 'Clinical Zen' aesthetic (rounded-xl, soft shadows).
Strictly follow the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard.
Implement the 'Split View' for the patient profile page.

specific_pages.login: Create a split-screen login page. Left side form, right side 'login_hero' image with a teal overlay.
specific_pages.dashboard: Display a list of assigned patients. Use cards with 'patient_avatar_placeholder' and key status indicators.
specific_pages.patient_profile: Show permanent info (Race, Gender, DOB, etc.) in a sticky sidebar (or top card on mobile). Main area shows 'Visit History' and 'New Visit' button.
specific_pages.new_visit_form: Break this into steps: 1. Vitals, 2. Physical Assessment (Head-to-Toe), 3. Systems (GI/GU/Resp), 4. Changes & Plan. Use Accordions for the long assessment sections.
specific_pages.pdf_report: Ensure the print layout is clean and removes UI elements (sidebar, buttons).

accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text).
Support keyboard navigation for all forms.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'Bootstrap' styles. Use the custom 'Clinical Zen' classes.
Avoid full-screen gradients. Use subtle 'subtle_glow' gradients only.
Always handle loading and error states gracefully.
Mock API calls where necessary if backend is not ready, but structure them to be easily replaced.
